experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description:
Custom web/mobile application development, website maintenance and design, business portfolio, schedule management, task automation and testing.
Technologies: React, TypeScript, Tailwind, Nest.js, TypeORM, Python, Testify.

experiences.title: Junior Developer
experiences.description:
Development of custom applications such as ERP, CRM, e-commerce for wholesale, retail and B2B. Integration and business rules support.
Technologies: React, TypeScript, Styled-components, Node.js, Express, PrismaORM, MySQL.

experiences.title: Technology Instructor
experiences.description:
Responsible for teaching technology, logic, programming, artificial intelligence, machine learning, and deep learning concepts to students in public schools (5th to 9th grade).
Technologies: Python, Scratch, Automation, and Virtual Reality.

experiences.title: Technical Support Analyst
experiences.description:
Responsible for incident resolution and customer service, training and customization of platform functionality, installation and maintenance activities on corporate websites.
Technologies: HTML, CSS, PHP, Twig, MySQL Workbench.
